name: places/ChIJE1OiE5LzwokR4v1PVJazucU
adrFormatAddress: 40 W 225th St #50, Bronx, NY 10463-7016, USA

editorialSummary.text: Retail chain offering home goods, clothing, electronics & more, plus exclusive designer collections.

originalText.text: Honestly, this was the BESTTT TARGET i been to thus far. They were fully staffed - to actually working & Friendly. The store is huge & clean. I was amazed and over whelmed with the amount of stocked items they had, literally every section was fully stocked & nicely organized. From the beginning when i walked i knew this was going to be an enjoyable experience, i smelled Pizza Hut & Starbucks. Overall, i was overly impressed with the service & in general the atmosphere. i love it here. My new shopping location.

text.text: Honestly, this was the BESTTT TARGET i been to thus far. They were fully staffed - to actually working & Friendly. The store is huge & clean. originalText.text: No one was available to help me find and unlock a product, besides a security guard who communicated he neither had the resources or walkie to call someone over to the Beauty department. I had to wait 10 minutes for someone with a key. Due to the disorganization of the products and signs, I couldn’t tell which price tag corresponded to what product. I asked Brenda, who unlocked the case, and she said she didn’t know the price. I asked her where to find specific products I was looking for and she said if I don’t see it then they don’t have it. I asked her how could I figure out the pricing for the selection they did have out and her reply was simply “I don’t know. You need to find someone with a gun to check. I have other things to do” and walked away. I found Brenda to be extremely rude in her tone and actions. I asked another employee for help as well as for a manger to immediately communicate my experience.  I traveled behind him as he approached a group of employees. When he communicated a guest needed to speak to a manager over by Beauty, they all laughed as the manager on duty, Aiza (spell-check, black woman, dark skin, 5’7”) sighed and jokingly displayed irritation, before realizing I was the customer. While I’m sure nothing will be done that’ll motivate these individuals to correct their actions with guests, I found it still important to communicate my experience. To top things off,  all of the items I was looking for, that Brenda said wasn’t in stock, showed that it was available at the location for order pick-up.

originalText.text: Always find what I need, always see stuff I don't need but want (or else it makes me laugh/think).

text.text: Always find what I need, always see stuff I don't need but want (or else it makes me laugh/think).

originalText.text: This Target is located on 225st across the street from Marble Hill projects in the Riverdale section of the Bronx. I use to really enjoy shopping here but with inflation, prices are very high here. This location unfortunately lacks inventory that you may see at other Target locations. It is very hard to get help from employees, and most of the time you see them standing around talking to each other, not doing much of anything. Also, if you use the Target app and you see a product you're looking for in stock on the app, don't expect for it to be really in this store. I've unfortunately had it happen to me several times.. Overall this location is not one of Target's best.

originalText.text:
This is my Neighborhood Target. The staff work together and are very helpful. Store is well kept shelves are usually well stocked.
The only concern I've noticed is the shopping Cart Guys in the Parking Lot actually litter... I'm sitting in the Lot and noticed an employee gathering the Carts and emptying the Garbage left in the Carts onto the Floor!
Why Why Why...
